name: Organised Crime
description:
Your father is associate captain of Demeo's crime familty. After he was put in prison you start to rule his business and to make a name for yourself on the streets of New Jersey. Here you need to show your management skills and become a murder machine.



Key Features:

  • A narrative, horror tinged adventure game that takes you on a journey through a world of crime

  • Find the way to make money for a family

  • Not linear dialog system gives you opportunity to make your own story
